newsitem.title: INDIA: DSP Merrill top fund raiser in 96/97, says PRIME.
newsitem.headline: DSP Merrill top fund raiser in 96/97, says PRIME.

text.p: DSP Merrill Lynch was the leading merchant bank in 1996/97 (April-March) in terms of funds raised from capital markets, Praxis Consulting & Information Services Pvt Ltd (PRIME Database) said on Tuesday.
"DSP Merrill has ranked first all-India by amount mobilisation covering all types of issues and all types of instruments," PRIME said in a statement.
The study covered all debt and equity issues including public, rights and private placement of issues.
DSP Merrill mobilised a total of 163.23 billion rupees, accounting for 53.8 percent of total funds mobilised during the year, the statement said.
